loc2.description: An old professor from Earth teaches you a thing or two. Pass a Luck (-1) [2] check to draw 1 Skill
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.name: Plateau of Leng
loc1.description: You wander the frozen wastes. No encounter

other.description: You come across a sleeping horror with a tentacle draped across a small gold idol. Silence is of the essence as you attempt to gently easy the idol out from under the creatures pseudopod. Make a Sneak (-1) check. If you pass, gain $3. If you fail, lose 2 Stamina
